Text.Page: Hey, there, <PCNAME>. Interested in fishing? If you are, come to Highwatch and find me.
Waining, the head of the Fishing Association taught you how to fish.

Welcome, welcome.
The Fishing Association is always looking for new members. Would you like to learn how to fish?"Sure!"
You can only fish in particular spots, but Arun and Shara provide many opportunities for patient anglers. Let me know when you're ready to start.

With its calm, clear waters, the Muricai Fishery is a favorite spot for beginners.

Are you ready to go?
Give my regards to Muten at the Muricai Fishery.

Waining sent you?
Welcome! Let's fish.

You'll need a fishing rod and some bait.

Here's some basic versions of both to get you started"Thanks."

You're all set! Go to a fishery and fish away.
Remember to always use a bait.

Try to catch a Crayfish.
If you run out of bait, you can always buy them from the Fishing Supplies.
Splendid! You've got pure talent!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Do I?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Fish are graded from 0 to 10.

To catch higher grade fish, you'll need upgraded fishing rods. Here's one of my spares to get you started."Thanks."

You can get better fishing rods by exchanging Angler Tokens with Angler Token Vendors like myself.

You can also upgrade your favorite rods as well.

Remember, the better the rod, the better the fish. Not to mention better money, of course!
Catch a Crayfish at the Muricai Fishery.
